Opening Dialogue.Text: Alright, corporal! Here's the battlefield laid out for you...
You can see that those dastardly apples are already there.
Your objective? To send as many oranges across the battlefield as possible!
But beware! Those apples are going to try and get across too. And when our troops collide, a fight is inevitable.
Whoever gets more troops to the other side, wins!
And... I hate to tell you this, but we are outnumbered. We merely have 2 troops at our disposal, and they seem to have 3!
Fear not! If we position our troops strategically, we shall emerge the victors!
Troops positioned in ^vertical ^lines will form an incredible flank! This will increase their defense astronomically!
The longer the flank, the greater the defense!
And troops positioned in ^horizontal ^lines will line up to upgrade their fighting power, transforming into yet more advanced soldiers!
If our enemies form a flank, a long line of soldiers might be just the thing to break it to smithereens!
I think a ^vertical flank ought to dispatch these neer-do-wells right quick!
Alright, simply click to place your troops, and remember, think strategically!
Once you've thought everything through, press the play button to lead the charge!
Good show, jolly good show!
And now our ranks have grown! I'll let you tackle this challenge on your own.
You made it out of that scrape!
But... oh no! It's the sinister general of the apples!
MUAHAHAHA!!! Well, well... if it isn't the stupid and incompetent orange general!
Having some corporal fight all your battles for you, hmm??
Well let's see how this greenhorn fares against our biggest army yet!
That general thought he could knock us out? Well he was quite wrong!
But what's this? It seems there are some plinths on this battlefield?
Our troops could break them down, but they look tough... A stronger unit would get it down faster!
It might take them quite a while. I'll ^pause the action every 10 turns, to allow you to place down more troops if you need to!
You've really improved! We'll best those apples yet!
Really? Because I think you still ^stink!
Apple general! Don't you think you've done enough?
Don't you think YOU'VE done enough?
I fail to see how that's a response to me...
YOU ARE OLD AND STUPID! I'll dispatch your corporal, then you!
Just try taking out THIS army!
Blast! There seems to be lava on the field!
Those apples are up to their old tactics yet again... any troops that walk into it will surely be lost.
But how shall we battle in this environment?
Hmm... the final battle!
But that means...
That's right, you old man! I'm here!
I'm throwing all my remaining troops at you!
You and your corporal should prepare to face your demise!
